column5: Hope it's it Lloyd... but "backpack" lets me think someone else booboo'd as well and you're still gonna need that new stuff you have ordered. Hopefully though it's your stuff !!
yeah I thought the same thing  but we can hope  I was also thinking....well I will wait to say
Sorry to hear that, Lloyd. I'm sure everyone will keep an ear to the ground for your stuff still. Damn.....

I was afraid you gave such a good list of what was in it if someone posted they found a rod bag with stuff in it , just describe what is in it and I will return it anyone reading you post could call and say what was in it
Sorry to get your hopes up, thought it might have been it, Ryan
Bummer, good luck. Did you call the timmies you were at to see if anyone turned it in there?
It's not in here Lloyd.. I'll keep looking...
Wayne you always know how to make a guy smile lol check in the nose for me and see lmao lol
NOPE !! Not in there...

LOST MY ROD BAG SAT MORNING LAKE SIMCOE.  IT COULD HAVE FALLEN OUT AT TIMS IN SUTTON OR AT JACKSONS POINT. TO ANYONE THAT FOUND IT WOULD LOVE TO HEAR FROM YOU. 4 RODS, 2 REELS, DIG SCALE, CUSTOM GAFF, 10 PACKS POWER BAITS, 3 SPOOLS OF BRAID. MONO SPOOLS AND A FEW ODDS AND SODS. THANKS LLOYD
So your Brother didn't leave it at home...

NOPE. I FELT SICK WHEN I WALKED IN AND IT WAS NOT IN THE HOUSE. ONLT PLACE IT COULD HAVE COME OUT NOW WAS TIMS OR JACKSONS POINT OR THE RUN TO  KEMPENFELT BAY BUT I HAVE NEVER HAD ANYTHING FALL OUT OF MY SHACK
Maybe that last gal you had over hiding a rod ...didn't want you to go fishing and hid those rods too...

LOL YOUR BAD!!!!!!! WELL I GUESS IT JUST MEANS I HAVE TO GO OUT AND PUT ANOTHER ONE TOGETHER. JUST HARD TOP FIND STOCK THIS TIME OF YEAR. WILL BE SHOPPING ALL WEEK TO BE READY FOR NEXT WEEKEND. BUT MAYBE ILL GET LUCKY AND SOMEONE WILL POST THEY FOUND IT. THAT WOULD MAKE ME SO HAPPY I WOULD GIVE HIM A FREE EVENING SALMON CHARTER.
Well that sucks!
YOU HAVE NO IDEA. YOU KNOW THE BAITS WE LOVE SO MUCH FROM THE PAST. I HAD NEW 5 PACKS OF THEM AND A FEW OTHER WE CANT BUY ANYMORE. OH WELL SPILT MILK. CAN ONLY HOPE FOR THE BEST.
I posted the same on another board for you    now if we can just teach Lloyd how to turn off the CAPS lock on  his computer
He's gonna take some work Terry... but I think we can train him in time..
How many of the 3 inch did you want? Just no glow left.
BUMP
once last bump
no help from the other site I posted it on  sorry
Must have been the weekend for stuff like that... tried to unload my enclosed trailer today... guess I dropped the keys for it in the parking lot! Had to cut them all off...

Well Lloyd, firstly, I feel for yah buddy! Loosing that stuff, which you've grown so accustomed to must be a real disappointment. That being said, I'm sure you could use one of Terry's rods as we all know he'll have no real use for more than one. Heck, he could leave tham all at home and still have the same level of success as previous years! HH
dang that's mean to say Joe. a tear comes to my eye  sigh..  LOL as it turns out I can't catch fish when Lloyd is  around  unless it's specks

Well Terry, consider yourself way ahead of me because I can't even catch those little spotted carp either! LOL Lloyd, I've put the word out for yah, I truly hope there is at least one honest person out there that gets reached by us and that you get your stuff back. HH

Thanks bud!! Now as for Terry's rods, Im not touching any of them!!!!!! They have Joe written all over them lol Its to bad you cant make the trip north with us in a couple weeks. I will have no one to drink drops with lol
Thats not true, I seen you catch a fish once on Browns Lake lol

Lloyd, found this ad on Kijiji in Barrie yesterday and thought it may be what you were after. Will try to pm you as well, Ryan  FOUND, a backpack and fishing equipment, on Lake Simcoe. Call Ron, to identify, what, when and where (705) 487-1382  I hope this helps..I am in Barrie and could pick up for you if it is yours.
that's fantastic!  Thanks for posting!
Thanks guys i just called and left a message.
This is good news to hear. Also I just realized I should put a sticker on the inside of my tackle box with my name and phone #.
trust me i already have a name tag made if i get my old one back or to put on my new one. time will tell. just waiting for the call back. Again thanks to everyone for keeping an eye out!!!!!!
well its not mine but sure made me smile for a bit lol well its good to see still some honest people in the world.
